title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 251 - Cases of Incarcerated Individual Misbehavior
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 251 - Cases of Incarcerated Individual Misbehavior

State Regulations
§ 251.1 to 251.7 - Renumbered

Subpart 251-1 - Initial Actions in Cases of Incarcerated Individual Misbehavior (§ 251-1.1 to 251-1.7)

Subpart 251-2 - Review Officer (§ 251-2.1 to 251-2.2)

Subpart 251-3 - Misbehavior Report (§ 251-3.1)

Subpart 251-4 - Inmate's Assistant (§ 251-4.1 to 251-4.2)

Subpart 251-5 - Timeliness (§ 251-5.1 to 251-5.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 251

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §112

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
